property.name: Text
property.value: React: After this dude fails a spell pull, pull again and use that value instead. The spell is aced after determining success (if it is still in play).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Move any number of your Deputies into your posse at a Government deed.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude has +1 bullet for each dude in the opposing posse with a bounty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: While this dude is at a Saloon, it is worth 1 additional Control Point. Noon: If this dude is at a Saloon, target another dude at the same location. Move the target to the Town Square, booted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: If another player calls out one of your dudes with a bounty, you may move this dude to that location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Pull: When a dude is aced, if the pull is higher than the dudeâ€™s value, discard them instead.

property.name: Outfit

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 2

property.name: Text
property.value: When this dude enters a posse put 3GR on her. You can use these GR during this shootout only. Discard any leftover GR after the shootout ends. Shootout: Target any number of your dudes and pay 1 GR for each. Move each target into this posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your wanted dude to another location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: A gunslinger token dude joins your posse. The dude is an Ace value, 2 stud, 0 Influence token dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot a card worth one or more Control Points or Bounty counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot your dude to reduce another dude's bullet rating by your dude's bullet rating. If their bullet rating is now 0 boot them.

property.name: Text
property.value: All dudes other than the controller's have -1 influence while unbooted at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Boot your dude at this location. Give them 1 Control Point if they do not already have one. Raise the bounty on that dude by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 4

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are the Winner, this dude cannot be affected by opponentâ€™s shootout abilities. Repeat Noon, 1GR: Look at another playerâ€™s hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 8

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, 1GR, Boot this dude: Target a deed at an adjacent location. Its owner must pay GR equal to its production or discard it. (If it is discarded, any dudes there go home booted.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex X: Target a dude at this location. X is the dude's Grit. If this Hex succeeds, you take control of the dude until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Reduce a wanted dude's bounty to 0. Discard this card. Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Raise the bounty on a dude by 2. Ace this card.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Noon: Reduce a wanted dude's bounty to 0. Discard this card.||Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Raise the bounty on a dude by 2. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex X: X is the value of the chosen dude. Boot the chosen dude at this or an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: One of your dudes calls out an opposing dude at their location. All dudes in both posses use their influence rather than their normal bullet rating for the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Search your deck and discard pile for a Horse and attach it to one of your unbooted dudes, paying all costs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Reduce any player's hand rank by 1. If targeting an opponent who revealed an illegal play hand, you may instead reduce the hand rank by 4 and this card is a Cheatin'! card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Ranch-Out of Town-Experimental

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon Pull, Boot: Gain 2GR. If the pull is a club discard this deed and all dudes on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Play a deed lowering its cost by 2GR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon: Boot this deed to raise or lower the influence of a dude at this or an adjacent location by 1 until after Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude has +2 Influence during Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude cannot be a casualty unless you lose the shootout by 3 or more ranks.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this dude is aced as a casualty, reduce your remaining casualties by 2.

property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull, Boot: Target a dude at this or at an adjacent location. If the pull plus this dude's skill are greater than the target's value, the dude is booted.

property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: If this dude is in a posse when you reveal an illegal draw hand, send him home booted and reduce his influence to 0 (for the rest of this turn).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Swap this dude with any of your dudes in a Shootout where the other player's posse has one or more dudes with a bounty.

property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Join a posse at an adjacent location.

property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: During Shootouts this dude's skill is equal to his bullet rating.

property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.value: Mad Scientist 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If this dude is at a Ranch, unboot it. Its abiliies may be used a second time.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Boot, 1GR: Gain GR equal to the production of a deed you control, but do not own.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 3

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Noon, 1GR: Add an influence marker to this Gadget. Discard all influence tokens on this card at the end of the Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mystical-Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot this gadget. An opposing dude has -1 bullet. If that dude is an abomination they must be chosen as the first casualty if possible during this shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon/Shootout, Boot: Give a target dude -3 Value (to a minimum of 1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex 4: Target a dude in the opposing posse. He suffers -1 Bullet and -2 Value. If he is aced or discarded during this shootout this Huckster gains 1 Control Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 5: Choose an ability printed on a Dude at this or an adjacent location. The Dude cannot use the ability until after Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot your horse to move a dude without a horse at this location home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After a call-out issued by one of your dudes is accepted, the mark has to form their posse before you form yours. The mark has -2 Bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Each other player may unboot a dude. Mark the town square. If the job succeeds, each other player must choose and ace one of their in-town dudes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: After you win lowball, one of your dudes gains +3 influence until after the first high noon action.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed is considered adjacent to all out of town deeds. Controller Noon: Boot this deed to move your dude on it to an adjacent location.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Non-Unique-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude cannot be booted, moved or have its bullet rating reuced by other players' abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Boot: If this dude is at a deed you do not own. Gain 2 GR.

property.name: Text
property.value: React Boot: At the start of the game, discard a card to draw 2 extra cards

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Boot, Pull: If this dude is at an out-of-town deed and the pull is red, search your discard pile or boot hill for a Mystical goods and add it to your hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 4

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude can only move to a location containing another dude from his faction.

property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time an opposing player reveals an illegal draw hand and you do not, you may draw a card then discard a card.

property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time an opposing player reveals an illegal draw hand and you do not, this dude may attempt to attach a gadget without booting.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Form a posse at an opposing dude's location. If the job succeeds that dude's controller has to give GR equal to that dude's influence to you, or discard them.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this dude's bounty increases, gain 1 GR.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this dude enters play, you may immediately take a free tradin' noon thang.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Pull, Boot: Target a dude in the opposing posse. If the pull skill is higher than that dude's grit, they are sent home booted. If the pull exceeds their grit by 5 or more, they are aced. If the pull is a spades or a joker, it affects this dude as well.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experimental-Improvement-Gadget-Difficulty 6

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a deed you control when built. Repeat Noon, 1GR, Pull: Move your dude on this deed to another location. If the pull is a club, discard the dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Target a Goods in the opposing posse and pull. If the pull is lower than the target, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude gains Huckster: 0 while this Goods is attached. If this card is ever discarded, moved or aced discard all other attached spells.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution Hex 5: If an opponent revealed an illegal draw hand, you may place a card from your draw hand (if you have one) into your play hand after resolution.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 5: Start a noon job targeting the town square. If the job succeeds, you may play an abomination from your hand reducing the cost by 6 GR. Add 1 CP to it.
